description: Geert Wilders was on trial over calls for fewer Moroccans in the Netherlands at a rally in 2014.
title: Geert Wilders: Dutch far-right leader cleared of inciting hatred
title_page: Geert Wilders: Dutch far-right leader cleared of inciting hatred - BBC News
maintext: Delivering their ruling, judges in Amsterdam said that the leader of the populist Party for Freedom had gone too far during a local election campaign six years ago when he got supporters to chant that they wanted fewer Moroccans in the country.
